# 透特之书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/toute-zhishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/toute-zhishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install toute-zhishu
toute-zhishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g toute-zhishu
toute-zhishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
